name: Fishers Oysters
description: Indigenous-led aquaculture on Quandamooka country. Shaun Fisher is building an oyster enterprise in Moreton Bay — growing premium oysters, restoring reef ecosystems, and creating jobs for community.

hero.heading: Restoring oyster reefs, restoring sovereignty
hero.subheading: Indigenous-led aquaculture on Quandamooka country, Moreton Bay

about.intro: Fishers Oysters is an Indigenous-led aquaculture enterprise on Quandamooka country, combining ecological restoration with economic sovereignty on Moreton Bay.
about.mission: To restore Moreton Bay's oyster reefs while building economic sovereignty for the next generation of Indigenous aquaculturists.

values.title: Country First
values.description: Caring for sea country through sustainable aquaculture that restores reef ecosystems.

values.title: Community Grown
values.description: Built by community, for community. Every oyster supports Indigenous enterprise.

values.title: Quality Driven
values.description: Premium oysters grown in the pristine waters of Moreton Bay.

values.title: Knowledge Sharing
values.description: Passing on traditional knowledge and building pathways for the next generation.

offerings.title: Premium Oysters
offerings.description: Premium oysters sustainably grown in the pristine waters of Moreton Bay. Wholesale and direct sales.

offerings.title: Oyster Tours
offerings.description: Walk our leases, taste fresh oysters, and experience Quandamooka sea country with the people who know it best.

offerings.title: Culture, Justice & Jobs
offerings.description: Creating pathways for marginalised young people and community through aquaculture.

quote.text: The real story is that we're proving Indigenous communities can lead sustainable marine management while building economic independence.

cta.heading: The Sea Country Has Been Waiting
cta.text: Whether you want to order oysters, book a tour, or support Indigenous-led aquaculture — we'd love to hear from you.

contact.address: Quandamooka Country, North Stradbroke Island (Minjerribah), Moreton Bay, Queensland
